Package sci.crayfis.shramp.analysis Description

This package contains the classes for performing analyses on pixel image data, e.g. determining pixel means and standard deviations, creating a mask for "good" pixels to be used in detection, and detecting significant pixel signals. All image/statistic/mask saving is initiated in these classes.
